LOGIN_WARNING:
WARNING!!!
READ THIS BEFORE ATTEMPTING TO LOGON
This System is for the use of authorized users only. Individuals using this computer without authority, or in excess of their authority, are subject to having all of their activities on this system monitored and recorded by system personnel. In the course of monitoring individuals improperly using this system, or in the course of system maintenance, the activities of authorized users may also be monitored. Anyone using this system expressly consents to such monitoring and is advised that if such monitoring reveals possible criminal activity, system personnel may provide the evidence of such monitoring to law enforcement officials.
Set_UP_WIZARD_ERR_CONTENT_PART_1: Following steps marked in red are either incomplete or have some errors.
Set_UP_WIZARD_ERR_CONTENT_PART_2: Please fix the issues within these steps in order to complete the setup.
DEVICE_ERROR_MSG: This device has invalid device port server mapping entries.
SETUP_WIZARD_SYSTEM_SETTINGS_INFO: Cisco VTS enables you to define global system wide parameters for enabling flexible overlays on the data center fabric.
SETUP_WIZARD_AUTHORIZATION_GROUP_INFO: Cisco VTS enables you to create authorization groups and assign devices you import into Cisco VTS, to these groups. Authorization groups are used to group devices with the same credentials (i.e. usernames and passphrases). Once the authorization groups are created, all the devices under these groups may be accessed without specifying the credentials every time they are accessed. If the same credentials are used for accessing all devices, one authorization group can be used.
SETUP_WIZARD_DISCOVERY_INFO: Cisco VTS enables you  to discover the devices by an automatic or manual option.  The fabric topology and its interconnections can be discovered automatically by specifying a seed device.  You can also manually create a CSV file with device details, in a prescribed format, and import it into Cisco VTS.

NOTE_TEXT: *Note:CLI Enable Passphrase is required for Collecting Few Inventory Collection Details. CLI Enable Passphrase & SNMP Write Credential are required for Configuration related Features to work such as Image Management , Config Changes & Config Archive.

SETUP_WIZARD_INVENTORY_INFO: The network inventory table displays details about the devices and hosts which have been added to the inventory.
SETUP_WIZARD_VMM_INFO: Cisco VTS enables you to specify the Virtual machine managers (such as OpenStack or VMware), so that VTS can register with Virtual Machine Managers using the plugin. This registration provides a tighter integration between the VMM and Cisco VTS. Once Tenant/Network/Subnets are created on the VMM, required overlay network(s) will automatically be created by Cisco VTS.

FIELD_INVALID_ERROR: Please make sure the values for device platform, device role, connection type and server type are valid.

SERVER_TYPE_INVALID_ERROR: Please make sure the value(s) for server type is valid.  Valid values are  'virtual-server', 'baremetal', 'fex'

WELCOME_NOTE_PART1: The Cisco Virtual Topology System is a standards-based, open software-overlay management and provisioning system. It automates data center network fabric provisioning for virtual and physical infrastructure.
WELCOME_NOTE_PART2: The system offers a rich set of automation and programmability capabilities across the entire Cisco Nexus switching portfolio to enhance the deployment of cloud-based services.

ROUTE_TARGET_TOOLTIP: Enter route targets to be shared across different VRFs. Valid route target formats are ASN2:NN4, ASN4:NN2 and IPV4:NN2 where NN2 and ASN2 = 1-65535, NN4 and ASN4 = 1-4294967295
ROUTE_TARGET_DIRECTION_TOOLTIP: Specify if route targets are to be imported or exported
ROUTE_TARGET_TYPE_TOOLTIP: Specify if the route target should be imported/exported on leafs (internal) or DCI (external)
ROUTE_TARGET_INVALID_ASN_ERROR: Invalid Administrator Field in Route Target
ROUTE_TARGET_INVALID_NN_ERROR: Invalid Assigned Number in Route Target
